37.str2: To saw, saw through. A strengthened form of a primary prio; to saw in two.

37.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
37.str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A sword. Probably feminine of a presumed derivative of mache; a knife, i.e. Dirk; figuratively, war, judicial punishment.

37.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
37.str2: From peri and erchomai; to come all around, i.e. Stroll, vacillate, veer.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A sheep's (sometimes pig's) hide, sheepskin. From melon; a sheep-skin.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Of a goat. From aix; belonging to a goat.

37.parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
37.str2: From husteros; to be later, i.e. to be inferior; generally, to fall short.

37.parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
37.str2: (a) I make narrow (strictly: by pressure); I press upon, (b) I persecute, press hard. Akin to the base of tribos; to crowd.

37.parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
37.str2: To treat evilly, hurt, torment. From a presumed compound of kakos and echo; to maltreat.

38.str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).

38.parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
38.str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Worthy, worthy of, deserving, comparable, suitable. Probably from ago; deserving, comparable or suitable.

38.parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Plural
Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
38.str2: To lead astray, deceive, cause to wander. From plane; to roam.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A desert place, desert, uninhabited region. From eremos; solitude.
A mountain, hill. Probably from an obsolete oro; a mountain: -hill, mount(-ain).
A cave, den, hideout. Neuter of a presumed derivative of speos; a cavern; by implication, a hiding-place or resort.
A crevice (in a rock), a cave, an opening, hole. Probably from optanomai; a hole, i.e. Cavern; by analogy, a spring.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.

39.str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

39.parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
39.str2: To witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report. From martus; to be a witness, i.e. Testify.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

39.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
39.str2: From a primary komeo; properly, to provide for, i.e. to carry off.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A promise. From epaggello; an announcement.

40.str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

40.parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Genitive Masculine Singular
40.str2: To provide, foresee. From pro and blepo; to look out beforehand, i.e. Furnish in advance.

40.parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
40.str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Stronger, more excellent. Comparative of a derivative of kratos; stronger, i.e. better, i.e. Nobler.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

40.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
40.str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.

40.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
40.str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

40.parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Plural
40.str2: From teleios; to complete, i.e. accomplish, or consummate.
